about_the_game:
Information on Trading Cards
Trading cards will be included in Box Maze 2 as soon as we reach the "confidence metric" recently introduced by Steam.



Jump back into the life of Cubert, who, after saving his girlfriend from Red, has signed up for the S.S.B. (Secret Services of Boxes). Your mission as Agent Cubert is to save Gaston's daughter.

Make your way through 100 exciting new levels while avoiding dangerous hazards like poison pits, blades, spikes, and new enemies. Your goal is to progress through increasingly difficult levels, collecting pizza, sweets, and jelly beans to boost your score. Gather potions to defeat enemies. Unlock achievements and discover secret messages as you navigate unique levels, each offering various completion routes and numerous hazards. Test your reflexes and your ability to find the quickest paths to reach the warp and advance to the next level. Box Maze 2 is a fun and humorous game designed to challenge your memory, reflexes, and more.



Experience a complete overhaul of graphics and animations to enhance the visual appeal! Box Maze 2 features a 2D platformer style with 3D effects, offering much better graphics and new animations for all enemies, characters, and hazards.



We’ve revamped the GUI and menu system to make them more user-friendly and visually appealing.



Box Maze 2 introduces more enemies, including water enemies, fire enemies, bomber boxes, and more!




New hazards like poison, blades, and spikes await! Navigate through these challenges to reach the warp and progress through each level.



Collect pizza, sweets, and jelly beans to boost your total score, as well as individual scores for each collectible.



Customize your character's appearance with skin packs.



Box Maze 2 will feature over 200 achievements. Why so many? Because reaching 100% completion won't be a quick or easy task! Many achievements will be earned by completing levels, completing tasks, and uncovering hidden secrets.



1. Engaging storyline
2. Scoreboard
3. Death counter
4. Various hazards
5. Level select
6. Character skins
7. New collectibles
8. Player-made levels
9. Secret levels
10. Steam Marketplace (Coming Soon)
11. Steam Trading Cards (Coming Soon)
12. Community-created character skins
13. Community-created levels
14. Community-created enemies
15. And much more!

name: Box Maze 2 : Agent Cubert

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 1.8Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 9500 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Box Maze 2 hardly uses any computing power and is very likely to run smooth on most computers. If your pc has lower specs than this and runs the game without issues please let us know so we can look into it and update this information.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above.
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 9800 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card

short_description: Jump back into Cubert's life! After saving his girlfriend from Red, he joins the S.S.B. (Secret Services of Boxes). Your first mission as Agent Cubert is to rescue Gaston's daughter. Navigate 100 exciting levels, avoid hazards and enemies, and collect pizzas, sweets, and jellies to boost your score!
